General.Name: Level Biotechnology
General.Description: Level Biotechnology Inc. markets and distributes cell culture, immunology, and molecular biology products in Taiwan. The company engages in the marketing and distribution of biomedical precision equipment. It provides services in the areas of mammalian and genetic toxicology, pharmacology, biocompatibility, and model animal production. The company offers preclinical research services to the biotech, pharmaceutical, medical device, animal health, and agrichemical industries. Level Biotechnology Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 80, Kangning Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
